name: views
title: views
content:
Nuby Express uses "Configuration by Convention" to manage the association of view templates with actions. If you have a file named `view.html`* then that file is used as an EJS Template for your action. This association is done at load time. 

-------------
<small>* Alternate name convention: `[action_name]_view.html`</small>
